snippet: French officials accused the actor of lacking patriotism after he moved Belgium in an apparent bid to avoid high taxes.
abstract: French officials accuse actor Gerard Depardieu, one of France's best-known actors, of lacking patriotism after he moved to Belgium in apparent bid to avoid high taxes.
lead_paragraph: French officials accused the actor of lacking patriotism after he moved Belgium in an apparent bid to avoid high taxes.

headline.seo: Gérard Depardieu Called ‘Pathetic’ for Leaving France
headline.main: Socialists Denounce Gérard Depardieu for Leaving France
headline.print_headline: Socialists Denounce Actor for Leaving France Over Taxes
